text: Bo Östen Undén JD (25 August 1886 in Karlstad - 14 January 1974 in Stockholm) was a Swedish academic, civil servant and Social Democratic politician. He was acting Prime Minister of Sweden 6 October 1946 – 11 October 1946 following the death of Per Albin Hansson. == References == Category:1886 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Swedish academics Category:Government ministers of Sweden Category:Jurists Category:Prime ministers of Sweden Category:People from Karlstad
title: Östen Undén
